basic.description: This course provides a forum for discussion of contemporary science teaching issues and concerns associated with the corequisite full-time internship.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Reflective Science Teaching

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ISC 5525, ISC 5535, ISC 5944, and ISC 5946. Corequisites: ISC 5945 and ISC 8938.
